descriptionEmergency: The Emergency section is a critical feature of the medical portal that provides users with access to emergency medical information and resources in case of an urgent health situation. This section contains information on emergency services, how to recognize common medical emergencies, first aid procedures, emergency contacts, and other relevant information to help users effectively respond to emergency situations. The goal of this section is to provide users with a quick and easy-to-use resource in times of need, ensuring that they receive the right help at the right time.
